mean_cn: adj. 地震的，地震引起的，剧烈的
mean_en: of, relating to, or caused by an earthquake
word_etyma: seism地震 + ic形容词后缀  → seismic 地震的
short_phrase: The seismic reading predicts an earthquake.
sentence: This machine will show seismic activity - and help us predict earthquakes.
sentence_trans: 这个机器会指示地震活动，并帮助我们预测地震。
